basics.summary: A Ph.D. candidate focusing on adaptive manipulation of deformable objects at the Division of Robotics, Perception, and Learning (RPL), KTH Royal Institute of Technology, with a research interest in combining robotics and machine learning for better perception and manipulation in unstructured environments.
